thread.title: Stillwater homecoming crash kills 4: Find out all about suspect Adacia Chambers
thread.title_full: Stillwater homecoming crash kills 4: Find out all about suspect Adacia Chambers | Examiner.com

author: Mandy Robinson
title: Stillwater homecoming crash kills 4: Find out all about suspect Adacia Chambers
text:
Play Officials said a suspected drunken driver killed at least three people and injured 22 others when she plowed into a crowd at Oklahoma State University's homecoming parade Saturday morning. The 25-year-old driver of the car, Adacia Chambers, was... on.aol.com A shocking scene occurred in Stillwater, Oklahoma today at the OSU homecoming parade. Adacia Chambers crashed her car into the crowd, killing four people and leaving dozens more injured. On Saturday, Heavy shared all about Chambers and what she went through over the last few days. Everyone is curious what could have caused her to crash through this crowd. Chambers is being charged with DUI.
Adacia worked at Freddy’s Frozen Custard & Steakburgers, a franchised restaurant in Stillwater and was sent home from her job on Saturday morning because they thought she was on drugs. It is unknown if they let her drive away from work after being sent home. One of her co-workers did speak out saying Chambers was "responsible and mature." Chambers was also called not very social by the co-worker. Adacia was at work last night till approx. midnight and then also came back this morning, but was sent home before her scheduled time to leave, which was 3 p.m. Adacia does live with her boyfriend in Stillwater. Pictures show that Adacia Chambers was able to walk away from the accident as officers escorted her to their car in handcuffs. She was booked into the Payne County Jail.
News OK actually spoke to Adacia Chambers' father who found out about the accident on social media. He described her as "timid." Floyd Chambers shared about his daughter and is shocked.
I can’t figure this out. This is not the person that’s my daughter ... I can’t imagine alcohol being involved. She is not an alcoholic that I’m aware of. This is just not who she is. They’re going to paint her into a horrible person but this is not (her.)
Her father doesn't think that there is any way that Adacia Chambers did this on purpose. Details about the crash are still coming at this time. It is a sad day in Stillwater, Oklahoma.
